style.Color:: Gun Metal Frame with Polarized Smoke Lens

reviewText:
This my second pair. I also have the glasses in black and ordered these after my son recommended I try the bronze. I ordered the bronze for him. My review of the first pair: 
 
"I now have glasses that: 
(1) stay on my face; 
(2) block all sunlight from the sides; 
(3) fit without my eyelashes brushing the lenses; and 
(4) have great, clear lenses." 
 
I'm seriously considering another pair.
summary: I also have the glasses in black and ordered these after my son recommended I try the bronze
